name: Otherside (Auxili)
description:
What is Otherside?

This is a story about a corrupted soul. No, not evil or a mean one. Just a slightly broken one. Your administrator and by extension Otherside Officer Ralph has gotten so fed up with it he just keeps reincarnating you without fixing the problem. So much so that you've started to maintain your memories even after a cycle. At this point, I guess it's time to take things into your own hands...

Features:

  • One story line with a one ending and many repeats
  • Yea thats it. I hope to add more though.

Otherside is a text-based game made in Twine for the Kindred Community Game Jam. I recommend playing it in full screen. Currently the game isn't finished sorry! I will try to continue updating and fixing the game after the Jam to bring it to completion.
